article_title: Ahead of the Tape: Krispy Kreme's Doughnuts Aren't the Only Thing Rich
article_text:
It was a scene at once familiar yet exotic.

British police were forced to issue a statement explaining they were "planning an arrest" when four squad cars were photographed outside a Krispy Kreme Doughnuts Inc. store in the city of Bristol. Until not so long ago, only cops on the other side of the Atlantic could be spotted...

twitter.description: There is no sign of the financial snafus that slammed Krispy Kreme a decade ago, but growth isn't all it seems.

article_summary:
British police were forced to issue a statement explaining they were "planning an arrest" when four squad cars were photographed outside a Krispy Kreme Doughnuts Inc. store in the city of Bristol.
Until not so long ago, only cops on the other side of the Atlantic could be spotted...
It was a scene at once familiar yet exotic.
